job.title: Software Development Engineer
job.description: Amazon is seeking a Software Development Engineer with experience in software development, design, and architecture of new and existing systems. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in programming and a passion for building scalable and reliable systems.
responsibilities: Participate in code reviews and maintain coding standards.
Manage source control and build processes.
Conduct testing and operations for software applications.
requirements: 3+ years of full software development life cycle experience.
Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent.
Experience with design patterns and system reliability.
skills: Proficiency in at least one programming language.
Knowledge of coding standards and source control management.

application.howToApply: Applicants should apply via our internal or external career site.
